Fargo.Plains Art Museum:
The Plains Art Museum is a fine arts museum located in downtown Fargo, North Dakota, United States.


== History ==
The history of the museum dates back to 1965 when the "Red River Art Center" opened in the former Moorhead, Minnesota, post office. The name of the museum was changed when it was incorporated with the Rourke Art Gallery to form the "Plains Art Museum" in 1975.
